title: SDS Inventory
description: The SDS Inventory is a web-based archive of all the satellite data maintained at the SSEC Satellite Data Services.
Users are able to quickly search through decades of satellite data with this convenient web interface.
With several methods of searching the inventory, users can either browse data at a glance or drill down to the exact file they need.
By working alongside MCFETCH, this webpage also allows users to easily download data via the internet.
